name: Cottage Chaos
description:
Cottage Chaos is a local multiplayer game where each player plays a cat of which one needs to cause as much chaos, while the other one needs to keep everything in order.

MovingWASD / Left Stick
JumpingSpace / Down Controller Button
Movement Ability
Shift / Left Controller Button
Interaction Abiliy
E / Right Controller Button
Ultimate Ability
Q / Up Controller Button
